summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving through an urban area. Initially, the vehicle is following a white sedan. As the vehicle progresses, it approaches an intersection with traffic lights. A person on a bicycle suddenly appears from the right side, crossing the road in front of the vehicle.
actions: The self-driving vehicle maintains a steady speed while following the white sedan. As it approaches the intersection, the vehicle slows down due to the traffic lights and the sudden appearance of a person on a bicycle crossing from the right side.
key_objects: 1) Front: A white sedan, approximately 10 meters away, maintaining a steady speed. 2) Right side: A person on a bicycle, approximately 5 meters away, suddenly crossing the road in front of the vehicle.
